title: Flight (ego)
data:
{{version028}}
{{flavour|It grants the wearer flight.}}

'''Flight''' ('''flying''') is an [[ego]] which causes you to [[fly]] until the item is no longer worn. Flying lets you float above [[water]] and [[lava]], ignoring their effects completely.

Flight can be found on:
*[[Boots]]
*[[Barding]]

==History==
*Prior to [[0.27]], flight could be toggled on and off, using [[Evocations]] for success rate (as there were negatives to flight).
